TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
It is! You're now back in the 90's.

I wish to catch all the fish today.
Granted. All fish now turn into exclusively piranhas and great white sharks.

eRR0R 4-4 wish not found

I wish to have caught fish and not gotten skunked. ;(

Granted. No skunks are on board your vessel. My previous post still applies, though.

 

I wish that I...that I...OH! I got one! That I could think of a wish!

Granted, but you forget about it.

I wish for

Granted. That         is now everything you have. 

I wish everything and everyone was perfect.

Now the world is the most boring place in the universe.

I wish for food.

A ball of mint ice cream the size of Minmus hits your house at ~10 km/s.

I wish for a lightsaber.

Granted. Your eyes are now extremely sensitive to light and that sword near you shines just like a lightsaber. It's a shame that you'll get blind in seconds.

 

I wish for gold coins.

Granted! You get a small pile, wait, more comes, now its a large piles. WAIT, more is coming,! Well,  now you are buried under them... and crushed.

I wish for a new profile picture.

Granted. It's worse that your original.

 

I wish that I had a sig.

Granted! It contains an illegal number

I wish I had a rabbit

Granted. It dies in a week.

I wish I had rabbit. (Note that this is a rather different wish to qzgy's.)

Granted. It dies in a week.  

I wish I had more time for KSP.

You forget to eat from all the KSP.

I wish for fish that wish.

Granted. They wish you dead. 

I wish for the next person who posts here to have all their rockets blow up.

Granted. I'm playing on you Hard Mode Career save. LOL

 

I wish the next poster was trapped in their worst nightmare for all of eternity.

Granted. That nightmare is a picture of your face!

I wish I had pizza

Granted! It has spinach.

I wish for big boom sticks

Granted. They are lit

I wish for Cheese Pizza
Granted. It has spinach-filled crust.
k. I wish for a working Eve lander.

404 Wish Not Found

 

I wish for a better GPU

Yup you got it. However your computer dies about a day after you get it.

I wish that I could watch the upcoming Falcon 9 launch. (Too late for me. )

You can! NASA put your seat directly above the rocket!

I wish I could build small AND large craft, not just large.
